Troubling new analysis: Why NZ needs tougher laws for serial speedsters https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/troubling-new-analysis-why-nz-needs-tougher-laws-for-serial-speedsters/P7GXPGG4ENDP3BSYBI5JAX5UZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/troubling-new-analysis-why-nz-needs-tougher-laws-for-serial-speedsters/P7GXPGG4ENDP3BSYBI5JAX5UZ4/ Jamie MortonStudy investigating speeding in NZ reveals a worrying link between tickets and crashes. Nelson electrician Stephen Burton ‘deeply sorry’ for builder Craig Johnston’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-electrician-stephen-burton-deeply-sorry-for-builder-craig-johnstons-death/3OU6ZXFFMBFKTJ2QRIQXAICUAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-electrician-stephen-burton-deeply-sorry-for-builder-craig-johnstons-death/3OU6ZXFFMBFKTJ2QRIQXAICUAU/ Tracy NealBuilder Craig Johnston died after being electrocuted in 2020. Sun, 17 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Nelson builder Craig Johnston (background) died in March 2020 as a result of an electric shock. Electrician Stephen Burton was found responsible and sentenced to home detention. He has now had his licence suspended for two years.
Measles: New outbreak would be worse than 2019, with up to 90 cases a week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/measles-new-outbreak-would-be-worse-than-2019-with-up-to-90-cases-a-week/EIJKGGW6JJFG7IR4D4J4X6LVTA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/measles-new-outbreak-would-be-worse-than-2019-with-up-to-90-cases-a-week/EIJKGGW6JJFG7IR4D4J4X6LVTA/ Isaac DavisonAfter a measles scare on Waiheke, briefings show the potential toll of a large outbreak. Sun, 17 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 New Zealand's low rates of MMR coverage mean a new measles outbreak would be far worse than the 2019 epidemic, the Government has been warned.
Major new study: Massive heatwave behind NZ’s hottest summer could become ‘almost annual’ by 2040s https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-new-study-massive-heatwave-behind-nzs-hottest-summer-could-become-almost-annual-by-2040s/5ZCRC5R3RRC2ZOHZQIP7WJ5OLM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-new-study-massive-heatwave-behind-nzs-hottest-summer-could-become-almost-annual-by-2040s/5ZCRC5R3RRC2ZOHZQIP7WJ5OLM/ Jamie MortonRegional NZ heatwaves once considered one-in-300-year events now concerningly more common. Sun, 17 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Marine heatwave conditions – like this, observed in late 2017 – helped fuel what remains New Zealand's hottest summer on record. Similar combined land and sea heatwave events have been observed over four summers since. Image / Ben Noll, Niwa
